name: gitping
description: Instant alerts for new GitHub releases and commits

scripts.dev:api: npm run setup && wrangler dev --config wrangler-api.toml
scripts.dev:poller: npm run setup && wrangler dev --config wrangler-poller.toml
scripts.deploy:api: npm run setup && wrangler deploy --config wrangler-api.toml
scripts.deploy:poller: npm run setup && wrangler deploy --config wrangler-poller.toml
scripts.deploy:api:prod: npm run setup && wrangler deploy --config wrangler-api.toml --env production
scripts.deploy:poller:prod: npm run setup && wrangler deploy --config wrangler-poller.toml --env production
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:api && npm run deploy:poller
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run deploy:api:prod && npm run deploy:poller:prod
scripts.db:migrate: npm run setup && wrangler d1 execute gitping --remote --file=src/schema.sql --config wrangler-api.toml
scripts.db:migrate:local: npm run setup && wrangler d1 execute gitping --local --file=src/schema.sql --config wrangler-api.toml
scripts.secrets:set: echo 'Run: wrangler secret put GITHUB_TOKEN --config wrangler-api.toml && wrangler secret put TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN --config wrangler-api.toml && wrangler secret put GITHUB_CLIENT_ID --config wrangler-api.toml && wrangler secret put GITHUB_CLIENT_SECRET --config wrangler-api.toml && wrangler secret put JWT_SECRET --config wrangler-api.toml && wrangler secret put FRONTEND_URL --config wrangler-api.toml && wrangler secret put GITHUB_TOKEN --config wrangler-poller.toml && wrangler secret put TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN --config wrangler-poller.toml'
scripts.build:web: cd web && npm install && npm run build
